profile:
COVID-19 Update: We open for business and available for phone calls, emails and virtual meetings as well. We're also taking all health and safety percautions for our employees and homeowners that we're in contact with. Contact us today to discuss things further. Be safe and take care. 

****

Ideal Stairs is your #1 choice for renovating staircases. Our company has been in the staircase renovation business since 2001. We serve Toronto, Greater Toronto and surrounding areas. With our expertise, we consider ourselves to be fine woodworkers, working daily with Red Oak wood – 100% Canadian content sourced from Quebec. We buy the raw materials and when possible, manufacture our own components, allowing us to pass along the savings to our consumers.

****

Are you interested in Jatoba and Walnut stairs? We also have great knowledge and experience working with these types of wood, and other exotic woods. With our custom manufacturing facility and skilled installation crews, your carpeted stairs can be transformed in about 3-5 days.  We also install flooring and by coordinating this with the staircase renovation, the time and disruption in your home can be minimized. Ideal Stairs can help make your staircase the showpiece of your home.
service_area:
Toronto, Greater Toronto Area (GTA) and surrounding areas

Durham Region - Ajax, Oshawa, Pickering, Whitby

York Region - Aurora, Markham, Newmarket, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Thornhill, Vaughan, Woodbridge

Peel Region - Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Caledon
products:
[.::STAIRCASES::.]
Our core business is fine woodworking. We custom manufacture all elements related to the staircase industry. We make posts, treads (steps), balustrades (spindles or pickets), handrails as well as entire staircases made only from red oak. Combining the custom manufacturing facility along with skilled installation crews allow us to renovate your staircase in approximately 3-5 days. Visit our website www.idealstairs.ca to view our Testimonials, and listen to very satisfied clients who have generously allowed us to record their successful renovation in their own words.
 

[.::FLOORING - HARDWOOD AND LAMINATE::.]
Staircase renovation is not our only product. We believe we are the only staircase manufacturer that will renovate your staircase AND install hardwood flooring. We want to minimize the time and disruption in your home by coordinating these two products. We are dealers for many brands of hardwood and laminate flooring but our proudest boast is we have hardwood flooring that is 25% and 100% Canadian content. We offer custom colours on your hardwood flooring (over 750 square feet) for Red Oak and Maple. We value our premium service by supplying and ensuring the colour you choose for your flooring is also used on the renovated staircase.
 

[.::SANDING AND STAINING::.]
If you already have a solid oak staircase but you want it changed to a different colour, we also provide sanding and re-staining services. We can transform your builder staircase into a dream staircase easily within your budget. While you are considering changing the colour of your staircase, this is an excellent time to change the appearance. Since we will be taking off the handrail, pickets and posts to sand and stain your steps, take the opportunity to install another post style, such as square, remodel your existing pickets and changing the look from old to new. For the record
services:
Ideal Stairs offer excellent and professional service in new stair construction, sanding, custom staining and renovating your existing hardwood staircase (oak or maple) right in your home. If you currently have carpeted stairs, we can help transform your staircase to solid oak treads. 

We can change your posts, add new pickets and match the material to an existing colour in your house. Within 3 days, your central foyer is transformed from great to amazing.

Our service is not only limited to stairs. We can also sand and offer custom staining and refinishing of hardwood flooring.

Flooring installation including oak and maple hardwood, laminate and engineered.

Visit our website www.idealstairs.ca for more information.
name: Ideal Stairs

profile:
Welcome to Craft-Bilt Materials Ltd
We began operating in April of 1992 after buying assets from Wrisco Ltd. Wrisco was a major supplier of aluminum patio covers, enclosure material and awnings for over 30 years. For 17 years we operated from the old Wrisco location, a 32,000 square foot facility in the Toronto suburb of Markham. In February of 2009, we moved to our current custom designed, 40,000 square foot facility in Ajax, Ontario (just East of Toronto).

Craft-Bilt’s main business is contractor sales of sunrooms, railing, waterproof decking, awnings and patio covers. We manufacture railing kits, canopy kits and sunroom kits. Our line of retractable fabric shades includes: fabric awnings, motorized screens, free standing canopies and canopies for pergolas.

We take a great deal of pride in the engineering behind our products. Proper engineering is important for obtaining building permits. You will find that Craft-Bilt products exceed the industry standard.

Our sales are primarily to customers in Canada. If you are interested in sunrooms or shade products in the USA, please contact Craft-Bilt Manufacturing Co. in Pennsylvania. They have been producing sunrooms in the United States for over 40 years.

Check us out on these sites as well:
https://www.facebook.com/craft.bilt.materials.ltd
https://twitter.com/CraftBilt
https://www.houzz.com/pro/craftbilt/
https://www.youtube.com/c/Craft-bilt
https://www.instagram.com/craft_bilt/
https://www.pinterest.ca/craftbilt/

profile:
OLG Railings company is providing services that deals with installation of railings, repairing and custom design.
***
OLG Railings provides a comprehensive range of iron work services. We specialize in providing the highest quality craftsmanship at a reasonable price. Our prices are unbeatable across Toronto and the GTA. We can custom fabricate, install and repair iron railings and fences. Contact us today for a free estimate!
***
We are number one iron railings company in toronto has a reputation for excellent customer service, and it is no surprise. We are available around the clock to provide our customers with the attention they deserve. If you are in need of high-quality iron railings in Toronto, OLG Railing Company is always here for you.
***
If you are looking for wrought iron railings in Vaughan that will not cost you an arm and a leg, you will adore working with our company. We are also a great option for Toronto residents who are searching for excellent prices on iron railings.
***
We provide a complete range of iron railings and iron gates repair services. If your iron railings need repair, don’t hesitate to contact us. OLG Railings provides no-obligation free quotes. If you are unsure whether your railings need to be repaired or replaced, contact us, and we will present you with options.
***
We do not only cater to the iron railing needs of residents of Toronto proper. We are also a trusted Vaughan iron railings company. If you are in need of wrought iron railings in Vaughan, we can accommodate all of your wishes. Whether you are located in Toronto or in Vaughan, you can depend on our pros 100 percent. We do not only manufacture fine iron railings. We also install them. We even offer in-depth repair services.
***
When you work with us, you can choose your own preferred railing designs. Our experienced professionals will make your iron railings just the way you want them. Customer service is always our number one goal. That is why we are available around the clock to service our customers, every single day of the week.
***
If you want to explore an extensive assortment of some of the best and most affordable iron railings around, call our company today for more information. We have been providing our customers with excellent service for a decade now. We provide the highest level of craftsmanship at the most affordable prices in Toronto! Call us today and see for yourself.

services:
Stairs refinishing: If the steps are in good condition it is not necessary to spend on new steps, instead we will just sand it down and apply new stain and varnish. We will remove all the old posts and spindles in order to properly sand the steps, and  have it stain and refinish therefore  we highly recommend after all to install new wood posts and new iron pickets or new wood  spindles, this way You will have a brand new stairway renovated within your bagged . Let us do that transformation for you 

Stairs recapping: If the stairs is carpeted or in a bad conditions the option is to install new solid wood steps and new risers. We will rip off  the old carpeted clean and prepare for the new solid wood steps to be install, this way you will have a brand new staircase on place and  along with a new iron pickets, new posts, new handrail, ending with a brand new Stairway. Let us do that transformation for you 

flooring: we offer installation labor of hardwood floor, laminate, vinyl, engineered floor, glue it down , Glue Assist Methods. If your hardwood floor is an a good condition it can be refinish, sand it down have it stain and finish  . Turning your carpeted and old floors  into a brand new floors. Let us do that transformation for you.

Kitchen Cabinets: painting, sanding, and refinishing its a good option when it comes to your kitchen cabinets saving like that time and under your bagged. We can turn your old looking Kitchen in to a luxury one just by painting or staining at your favorite color. Let us do that transformation for you.

Products : We use hight end quality acrylic paints from Benjamin Moore to have our kitchen cabinets painted with a grade results and durability , we use water base and oil base stains and varnishes for our finishing, we customize the stains to match any color.

profile:
We are a team of professionals specializing in installation of custom glass shower enclosures and other architectural glass. We take pride in our work while ensuring  we provide only high quality glass that is locally fabricated with high quality hardware. 


We specialize in professional installation of custom glass shower enclosures. 

We also offer:

Glass Railings

Glass Office Partitions

Custom Mirrors

Glass Shelves

Glass Table Tops


We provide our customers full assurance with them knowing that all work comes with a one year warranty on installation and a three year warranty on hardware. Along with that, we are a licensed and insured company.
name: Bola Glass

profile:
We have been right here for over 20 years now.  That makes us a very well-established glass company that you can rely upon to be here when you need us.  We are a family owned business by owner, Feroz Yaqoobi.  Feroz has carried the traditions of high skilled custom glass and mirror work for residential and commercial work.  We can boast that most of our glass professionals have been working for us for over a decade.  We work hard to keep our employees happy so we can retain the highest quality workers to perform the services for your projects.
When you want a custom glass project to go smoothly, on-time and made of superior materials, you can trust Glass Build Canada.  We’ve made lots of friends out of our customers by providing them with superior products that last longer and perform better.  Our employees’ workmanship shows in the great attention to detail in our work.

profile:
Serving Southwestern Ontario and the GTA since 1992, we provide our customers with quality railings at a reasonable price. 
We offer expert advice to help you select the right railing design and material to elevate your custom home or renovation project. 
We have a beautiful showroom that is available for you to view by appointment. 
We feature in-house design and manufacturing to provide you a myriad of possibilities to our clients, whether they are interior designers, home owners, architects or builders.
​
Railing Excellence provides you the expert advice you need to help you choose the right material, style, and color scheme for your project. 
We place a high importance on product quality through our quality control and inspection procedures to ensure product consistency and expert installations. 
We are proud to have loyal, dedicated and highly experienced employees, which have always been one of our greatest assets. 
This is what makes Railing Excellence the right choice for you!

905-660-3775

profile: Best Stair Company in Toronto. Our woodwork craft masters put all their efforts into fulfilling our client’s requirements. Our process begins with designing the staircase, manufacturing and finally installing. We are experts in not only new staircase and railing manufacturing but also renovation of already-made staircase and railings. We also provide resurfacing (capping), trim and nosing services to our customers. For a free quote please contact 416- 728- 8115
